content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 3 distinct layers
- Bottom layer: Two vertical green blocks forming pillars
- Middle layer: One horizontal yellow block connecting the pillars
- Top layer: A red house-like structure with an orange roof consisting of triangular pieces

Let me break down the blocks needed and provide the assembly sequence:

1. Bottom Layer:
- Two identical vertical green blocks for the pillars (using block #5)

2. Middle Layer:
- One horizontal yellow block (using block #8)

3. Top Layer:
- One red arch piece (using block #1)
- Two orange triangular roof pieces (using blocks #15 and #16)

Assembly Order:
{
Step1: Move block with index 5 (left green pillar)
Step2: Move block with index 5 (right green pillar)
Step3: Move block with index 8 (horizontal yellow connector)
Step4: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
Step5: Move block with index 15 (left orange roof piece)
Step6: Move block with index 16 (right orange roof piece)
}

This sequence will construct the structure exactly as shown in the target image, using the blocks in their correct orientations without any rotation.
